original_text: Then Joshua tore his clothes and fell to the earth on his face before the ark of the Lord until the evening, he and the elders of Israel. And they put dust on their heads.
korean_text: 여호수아가 옷을 찢고 이스라엘 장로들과 함께 여호와의 궤 앞에서 땅에 엎드려 머리에 티끌을 뒤집어쓰고 저물도록 있다가

sentences.original_text: and fell to the earth on his face
before the ark of the Lord
he and the elders of Israel
And they put dust on their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자기 머리에 티끌을 뿌렸습니다
